rooms.description: Spacious corridor leading from the entrance to living areas, designed with ample natural lighting and ventilation. Vastu-aligned entry for positive energy flow.
Open-plan living area with modern furnishings. Features a central hearth and seating arrangements conducive to family gatherings, ensuring north-east corner alignment per Vastu.
Separate dining space adjacent to the living room; designed for casual meals. Uses natural light with south-facing windows as per Vastu recommendations.
Contemporary kitchen equipped with modern appliances, optimized for energy flow and functionality. Placed in the southeast direction following Vastu principles.
Spacious master bedroom featuring a private balcony, ample storage, and an ensuite bathroom. Positioned in the southwest as per Vastu guidelines for restful energy.
Two guest bedrooms with individual balconies. Designed to maintain privacy and comfort. Aligned in the west as per Vastu for positive social interactions.
Dedicated library area with built-in shelves, comfortable seating, and ample lighting. Located in a quiet corner of the ground floor, ideally in the northeast for knowledge enhancement per Vastu.

Well-equipped private gym with essential fitness apparatus, located in a dedicated space ensuring proper ventilation and lighting. Vastu suggests placement on the south or west side for energetic activities.

openings.description: Large entrance door designed for both aesthetics and functionality, providing a welcoming entry point. Vastu-compliant with an unobstructed view.
Balconies attached to bedrooms offering exterior views and fresh air circulation. Each bedroom has its dedicated balcony, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.
Multiple windows across the villa for natural lighting and ventilation. Placed strategically per Vastu guidelines to promote positive energy flow throughout the space.
Well-sized doorways connecting various rooms, ensuring smooth movement and functional connectivity in line with contemporary design principles.
